title: EYL #121 THE BUSINESS OF MOTIVATIONAL SPEAKING FEAT. INKY JOHNSON
itunes:title: EYL #121 THE BUSINESS OF MOTIVATIONAL SPEAKING FEAT. INKY JOHNSON
description:
Inky Johnson is one of the most powerful voices you will ever hear. In 2006, he was a star cornerback for the University of Tennessee. A career in the NFL was in his sights until he suffered a debilitating injury that permanently paralyzed his right arm. 


What he has done since has made him an iconic transformational figure. Today he's one of the world's top inspirational speakers, he's courted by some of the largest corporations, the biggest institutions, and professional sports teams. Aside from being an inspirational speaker as he calls it, he is also a best-selling author, philanthropist, entrepreneur, and devoted family man. 


In episode 121, Inky talked us through the business model of public speaking, he outlined his journey to the top, he spoke about how he has adjusted his business since COVID-19 has put a halt on most in-person events, and more.  #motivationalspeaker #publicspeaking #inkyjohnson 


Host IG: https://instagram.com/earnyourleisure?igshid=1xxyi7wafxf7a


Guest IG: https://instagram.com/inkyjohnsonmotivate?igshid=zckhdq06s31y


75% off EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
